title: up and down
body: If the caption is not focussed, the up and down arrows will move to the previous and next transcriptions respectively. If the caption or autocomplete is focussed, it will move between items in the list. Hold down the alt key to override this and move between transcriptions normally.

title: left and right
body: Left and right arrows move between characters in the caption or the autocomplete, but it can be modified by alt to move between whole words.

title: numbers
body: Pressing a number key will select the corresponding item in the autocomplete and complete the word or phrase.

title: enter
body: Enter will complete a phrase and set a transcription as complete, then move to the next transcription if pressed again.

title: backspace
body: Backspace deletes characters as normal. Modify with alt to delete the entire current word. Modify with ctrl to delete the entire caption. Modify with alt+shift to delete the last flag. Modify with ctrl+shift to delete all flags.

title: space
body: Space bar will type a space normally, but continue to autocomplete a matching phrase if it can. Hold ctrl to override this behaviour.

title: tab
body: Tab will repeat the audio and focus the caption. Modify with alt to focus the autocomplete.

title: Audio player
body: Click and drag on the audio player to select a portion to focus and replay.
